title: Generative AI-Enabled WebQuest Design Project for Pre-Service Mechanical Engineering Educators

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mechanical engineering principles and introductory instructional design understanding
context.additional_context: Domain experts (advanced) as working professionals develop webquest projects via generative AI tools and the LBD framework through mobile microlearning.

learning_goals: Generate three or more mechanical engineering educational content ideas using generative AI tools
Evaluate the applicability of generative AI in designing webquest projects according to the LBD framework
Critically verify the accuracy and educational suitability of generative AI outputs through validation procedures
Share and exchange feedback on webquest prototypes in large-scale learning environments using collaborative tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
